DOC.brief_summary: ABSTRACT Study Objective : To compare effect midazolam diphenhydramine prevention metoclopramide induce akathisia . Methods : This randomize , double-blind control trial aim investigate co-administered midazolam versus diphenhydramine prophylaxis metoclopramide induce akathisia . Patients 18 65 year age present ED primary secondary complaint nausea and/or moderate severe vascular type headache eligible study . Patients randomize one fallowing three group : ( 1 ) metoclopramide 10 mg + midazolam 1.5 mg ( 2 ) metoclopramide 10 mg + diphenhydramine 20 mg ( 3 ) metoclopramide 10 mg + placebo . Metoclopramide administer 2 minute bolus infusion . Midazolam , diphenhydramine normal saline solution administer 15 minute slow infusion . Whole procedure observe , akathisia sedation score vital change record .
